## Troubleshooting

- Analysts will notify you if they need a specific slide rescanned via the Sporecyte Ops channel.
- Regularly check this channel for any requests or issues.

This guide ensures all new hires can effectively process samples from receiving to scanning, maintaining the highest standards of accuracy and organization.
